r.d: This extension provides a set of ODBTP, Open Database Transport Protocol, client functions. ODBTP allows any platform to remotely access Win32-based databases. Linux and UNIX clients can use this extension to access Win32 databases like MS SQL Server, MS Access and Visual FoxPro.
r.n: Incorporates support for the new features that were added into the ODBTP 1.1.2 C client library. The extension's source file was also renamed from odbtp.c to php_odbtp.c.
